name: Betty Spark
opinion: "Writing a scala library by typing random keys couldn’t be easier. With the Ultimate Scala Keyboard I create new libs on a daily basis. Bringing the hell of infinite JavaScript packages into the Scala world is a real joy."

name: Mark Twain
opinion: "Scala is dead? I thought so, too. But I gave it another try with the Ultimate Scala Keyboard. It turned out, that regular keyboards with all the unnecessary keys have distracted me so much, I literally couldn’t see the wood for the keys."

name: Myrton Grunwald
opinion: "You can’t call yourself a Scala developer without the Ultimate Scala Keyboard. Especially the sliding stress pad makes me feel relieved. From now on I write Circe encoders and decoders only in Circe mode."
